scripts.build:linux: NO_STRIP=1 pnpm tauri build --bundles rpm deb
scripts.build:docker:web: pnpm -w exec docker build -f apps/desktop/dockerfile.web --target output --output type=local,dest=./apps/desktop/dist .
scripts.build:docker: cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 pnpm -w exec docker build -f apps/desktop/dockerfile.desktop --target output --output type=local,dest=./apps/desktop/dist-tauri .
scripts.build:docker:linux: cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 pnpm -w exec docker build -f apps/desktop/dockerfile.desktop --target linux-output --output type=local,dest=./apps/desktop/dist-tauri .
scripts.build:docker:macos: cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 pnpm -w exec docker build -f apps/desktop/dockerfile.desktop --target macos-output --output type=local,dest=./apps/desktop/dist-tauri .
scripts.build:docker:windows: cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 pnpm -w exec docker build -f apps/desktop/dockerfile.desktop --target windows-output --output type=local,dest=./apps/desktop/dist-tauri .
